titleStmt.title: The angels oath, time is no longer The kingdoms of this world, are become the kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ, and he shall reign for ever and ever, Revel.10.6. and 11,15. A prophecy from Mr. Mason's people at Water-Stratford.
titleStmt.author: Glover, Elizabeth, fl. 1694.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
